articles.title: The Truth About Food and Acne: 7 Diet Mistakes That Wrecked My Skin (And How You Can Avoid Them)
articles.author: Stephanie Garcia
articles.description: Struggling with acne despite trying every skincare product? The problem might be on your plate. I made 7 critical diet mistakes that destroyed my skinâ€”here's what I learned and how you can avoid them.
